runs.comm: caught behind first ball! What screams of joy from PNG! That ball was so short and so wide, and Shahzad need not have played it. But what he did was reach for the ball without moving towards it, his feet were rooted. He ended up getting a toe edge through to the keeper. This game is on
another wide ball outside off, this time the batsman lets it go, as Shahzad should have
good length around off, defended on the back foot
short of a length, pulled away through square leg for a single
a full ball swings away from the right-hander, the batsman lets it go
good length around off stump, the batsman defends with a straight bat
nearly in the blockhole on middle stump, the batsman pushes it towards mid-on
strays on to the pads this time and Stanikzai turns it past the man at short fine leg and finds the boundary much quicker than PNG did in their innings
once again the line is poor on leg stump, the ball brushes Stanikzai's pads as he tries to glance and races to the fine leg boundary
shot! Stanikzai waits in his crease for a short of a length ball with width outside off stump, he cuts hard and the ball bounces over the infield and rushes to the point boundary
steps out of his crease a bit too early and then has to wait, the bowler adjusts to bowl a tight line and length and the batsman ends up defending
more width outside the off stump and Mangal slaps it to the point boundary, Afghanistan on their way now ...
tucked off the pads in front of square for a single
a full ball slants into the right-hander and hits the pads after the batsman misses his flick, there's an appeal for lbw but that's going down leg side
Stanikzai chases after a wide ball and tries to drive through cover, he gets beaten by the away movement
edged but the ball does not carry to first slip, he pushed at it off the front foot but played it with soft hands
defended on the front foot on the off side
good length outside off, not much pace on that ball, defended on the back foot
Mangal plays a loose drive, reaching far away from his body outside off, and is beaten
played back to the bowler, who stops the ball in his follow through
the slower ball keeps low, the batsman had moved across his stumps too early but does well to adjust, wait and swat the ball behind squre

a fuller ball that is played to mid-on, the batsmen chance a risky single to the fielder who runs in quick from mid-on, picks up cleanly and throws at the bowler's end, a direct hit would have been out
cut off the back foot behind point
good length outside off stump, cut off the back foot towards point
short of a length outside off, the batsman waits in his crease and opens the face late to steer the ball behind point
good length just outside off, the batsman stays back and defends with a straight bat
tucked off the back foot towards midwicket, that was on a tight line and length around off stump too
moves back and across and nudges the ball off his hips between square leg and short fine leg
nudged off the pads towards midwicket this time
a length delivery and Mangal has mangled the ball over mid-on with a flat-batted slog that clears the in-field
played off the pads towards mid-on
goes deep into his crease and works the ball off his pads through square leg
a slower ball in the blockhole, played from the crease into the covers
worked off the pads behind square
good length on off, nudged on to the leg side, between midwicket and square leg, for a single
worked off the pads through the leg side for one more
goes back into his crease and glances the ball to fine leg
he wound up to smash that out of the park but failed to connect with the slower ball outside off, but he can have another go because the bowler over-stepped and there's a free-hit coming up
short ball again and this time Stanikzai slugs it over the infield with a muscular pull, there's a fielder in the deep
waits on the back foot and steers the ball behind point for a single
played from the crease in front of point for a single
short of a length outside off, cut off the back foot through point
good length, pitching on middle and straightening, squares up the batsman as he defends from his crease
pushed off the front foot towards long on for a single
steps out of his crease and clips a full ball off his toes in front of square leg
dabbed with soft hands on the leg side for a quick single
a full and straight ball, punched down the ground for a single with a lovely straight bat
good length outside off, defended on the off side
that is the longest hop you can hope to see! The batsman opens up his stance, waits for it, and then slams it over the deep midwicket boundary with a monstrous heave
left alone outside off stump
width outside off stump, the batsman cuts but is beaten, that was bowled really slow
played through midwicket for a single
bowled wide outside off stump once again, and the batsman can't connect with the cut once more
the bowler dives full length to his right to cut off the shot
the ball spins back sharply into Mangal, who is caught on the crease as he defends, there was an inside edge on to the pad
that's another short ball, pulled hard on the back foot along the ground to deep midwicket
punched on the back foot towards extra cover, the fielder dives to cut off the shot
pushed between midwicket and mid on for a single
shorter ball outside of, punched off the back foot through cover
worked through midwicket for a single

stumped him! Lovely ball from the legspinner, gave that a lot of flight and slowed his pace, enticing the batsman out of his crease and into a mighty heave. Stanikzai did not get to the pitch of the delivery, though, and connected with nothing as the ball spun away from his bat. The keeper had a straightforward stumping to make
cut off the back foot towards point
steps out of his crease and defends
played off the back foot through point
shorter and flatter ball, pulled firmly to midwicket where the fielder makes a half-stop
that's a lovely shot, moved out of his crease gracefully, got to the pitch of the ball perfectly, and sent it sailing over long on with a smooth swing of the bat
and again! Straighter this time! Mangal gets to the pitch of the ball and lofts so cleanly, clearing the straight boundary comfortably ...
plays it off the back foot and is beaten outside off stump, that kept low and was quite close to off stump
defended back to the bowler
Shenwari tries to hit on the off side bit gets an inside edge on to his pad
played to long on for a single
goes on to the back foot and lofts the ball towards cow corner, no real timing on it
played towards deep cover for a single
driven to long on for a single
pushed gently off the front foot past the bowler for a single
wide ball outside off, the batsman reaches for it and cuts but can't connect
a length delivery outside off, driven off the back foot through cover
was that a chance? It was, a tough one though. The batsman went back to run the ball fine past the keeper and got a late and thick edge that brushed the keeper's gloves ...
a full toss and the batsman paddles it past the keeper on the leg side
short ball and the batsman pulls hard towards long on where Siaka runs hard to his right and dives to save the boundary, he recovers quickly to throw at the striker's end and hurry the batsman
tossed up outside off, driven through point for one more
nudged on the leg side for a single, Amini chases the ball to midwicket himself
goes back and pulls the ball through midwicket for one more
the reverse swat has failed Shenwari! The ball was really short but Shenwari got into an awkward position and hit the ball straight into the hands of the fielder at point
that will ease some of the nerves, swept for a boundary, the orthodox way this time
driven through midwicket for a single, that brings up Mangal's fifty too ... it could be the innings that sends Afghanistan on their way to the 2016 WT20
driven through covers for another single
cut off the back foot through backward point
Mangal stays back and works a length ball off his pads through square leg
pushed down the ground sensibly to give Mangal the strike
Mangal keeps the strike with another punch towards long on
leans forward and taps the ball off his toes towards midwicket for a single
a short ball but the batsman chooses to go back and simply dab it through midwicket
defended on the back foot on the leg side
tossed up on middle stump and Nabi slogs it towards deep midwicket
pushed off the back foot towards midwicket

the catch has been put down! Vani Vagi what have you done! Nabi went for the big hit but he ended up slicing the leg break in the air towards mid-on, the fielder came running in from the deep and got to the ball comfortably. He wasn't balanced though and could not hold on
a full toss down leg side, that's a wide
a low full toss on the pads, flicked towards deep square leg
in the blockhole outside leg stump, cramping the batsman for room, the eke a run out on the leg side
a full toss swings into Mangal, who does well to deploy a straight bat and drive to long on
Nabi's been caught this time! The ball was pitched on a shorter length well outside off, Nabi was hurried on the pull shot and got a top edge that swirled towards square leg and landed in Dai's hands
a low full toss on the pads, a poor follow up ball to the wicket delivery, flicked to deep square leg
pushed down the ground and Mangal will keep the strike as the end game begins ...
full and straight, Mangal leans forward and pushes the ball past the bowler with a straight bat
full angling into the left-hander, he too plays the ball gently past the bowler with a straight bat
worked of the pads through square for a single
in the blockhole outside off stump, the bottom edge goes to short fine leg but the bowler has over-stepped! A free hit coming up for Najibullah ...

oh my word, it's all gone wrong for PNG, the ball was full but Najibullah got under it and lofted the ball flat towards long on. It wouldn't have been out had Morea caught it because of the free hit but the ball bounced off his hands and went for six. And it's another no-ball ...
swings hard and misses the free hit this time
driven down the ground for a single

there's an appeal for a run out at the bowler's end from Nou, after he bent down low to try and field a drive from the batsman. The ball hit the stumps at the bowler's end but when the umpire asks Nou if he touched the ball, he seems to say he did not ...
cut off the front foot through point for a single

that is a colossal strike to send Afghanistan into the 2016 World T20 in India! Najibullah slogs and makes incredible contact, the ball lands among the sparse spectators beyond the deep midwicket boundary
